H0.text: In which field of the arts has American born Annie Leibovitz achieved fame. Painting

H1.text: In which field of the arts has American born Annie Leibovitz achieved fame. Sculpture

H2.text: In which field of the arts has American born Annie Leibovitz achieved fame. Dance

H3.text: In which field of the arts has American born Annie Leibovitz achieved fame. Photo's

A4.text: Anna-Lou Leibovitz is an American portrait photographer best known for her portraits, particularly of celebrities, which often feature subjects in intimate settings and poses.

A5.text: Leibovitz's Polaroid photo of John Lennon and Yoko Ono, taken five hours before Lennon's murder, is considered one of Rolling Stone magazine's most famous cover photographs.
